name: Number Wizard (Marcomix)
description:
My second completed project. Not as presentable as Prison Text Adventure, but it was more complicated on a programming level. I'm not satisfied with how it sometimes guesses numbers it's already guessed before, but the course did not acknowledge this issue so it's time to move on. 
If you are interested in making something similar to this, the course I am taking is on Udemy. com, called Learn to Code by Making Games - Complete C# Unity Developer by Ben Tristem.
